CQ1.query: Show me the names of wines from a specific winery--Chateau Montelena, along with their grape color.
CQ1.sql: SELECT w.name, g.color FROM wine w JOIN grapes g ON w.grape = g.grape WHERE w.winery = 'Chateau Montelena';

CQ2.query: List all wines that have a rating score above 90, along with their grape color.
CQ2.sql: SELECT w.name, g.color FROM wine w JOIN grapes g ON w.grape = g.grape WHERE w.score > 90;

CQ3.query: Find the average price of wines by grape color.
CQ3.sql: SELECT g.color, AVG(w.price) AS Average_Price FROM wine w JOIN grapes g ON w.grape = g.grape GROUP BY g.color;

CQ4.query: Show me the total cases produced for each grape type and their colors from wines that are ready to drink by 2025.
CQ4.sql: SELECT g.grape, g.color, SUM(w.cases) AS Total_Cases FROM wine w JOIN grapes g ON w.grape = g.grape WHERE w.drink <= '2025' GROUP BY g.grape, g.color;
